name: custom enc
story: We have a source for a custom encryption, can you please check it out and decrypt this text for us: 'eawethkthcrthcrthonutiuckirthoniskisuucthththcrthanthisucthirisbruceaankceaaneabrkeaeathiseneaonthenthanisirkeathwethirisbrkeathirthypthkkirthoniskeatithkthktheakeathoneauisuthkthantheneaypthkisyputi'
